body.p: All the readers of the Arbeiter Zeitung will be very happy to learn that we are going to erect a school for the purpose of educating immigrant Germans in the ways of U. S. A. The name for the school is "Chicago Athenaum, 48-54 S. Dearborn Street. The students will learn the English language, algebra, writing and bookkeeping, and the tuition will be very low so that everybody can benefit by the school.- Professor A. Grath will be the leader.

The Comrades will recommend the school, and it will mean so much for the newcomer to learn the English language correctly. The next term of school will start April 12th. The classes are held in the evening so that everybody may attend.
